languages.text: "Кроме безупречного служения? Есть кое-что, о чем я много думал... О том, что Кредо уступает Лекс Империалис в близости к Богу-Императору. Я хочу, чтобы Его закон стал единственным столпом веры для арбитров. Хочу вести их не только как маршал, но и как проповедник".

"Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His Law to become the sole pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."
languages.original_text: "Кроме безупречного служения? Есть кое-что, о чем я много думал... О том, что Кредо уступает Лекс Империалис в близости к Богу-Императору. Я хочу, чтобы Его закон стал единственным столпом веры для арбитров. Хочу вести их не только как маршал, но и как проповедник".

traits.locale_text: "Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His law to become the only pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."

"Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His Law to become the sole pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."

languages.text: 「完璧な奉仕以外に、ですか？実は最近ずっと考えているのです…信条集はレックス・インペリアに比べて神帝陛下のご意志から遠ざかっているのではないかと。アービトレイターにとっては陛下の法こそが唯一の信仰の柱であるべきだと思っています。私は、将帥としてだけでなく、プリーチャーとしても彼らを導いていきたいのです」
languages.original_text: "Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His Law to become the sole pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."

traits.locale_text: 「完璧な奉仕以外に、ですか？実は最近ずっと考えているのです…信条集はレックス・インペリアに比べて神帝陛下のご意志から遠ざかっているのではないかと。アービトレイターにとっては陛下の法こそが唯一の信仰の柱であるべきだと思っています。私は、将帥としてだけでなく、プリーチャーとしても彼らを導いていきたいのです」

languages.text: "Abgesehen von unbestechlicher Dienstbarkeit? Ich habe in letzter Zeit tatsächlich viel nachgedacht ... darüber, wie der Glaube weiter vom Gottimperator entfernt ist als das Lex Imperia. Ich will, dass Sein Gesetz die einzige Säule des Glaubens für die Arbitratoren wird. Ich will sie nicht nur als Marschall führen, sondern auch als Prediger."
languages.original_text: "Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His Law to become the sole pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."

traits.locale_text: "Abgesehen von unbestechlicher Dienstbarkeit? Ich habe in letzter Zeit tatsächlich viel nachgedacht ... darüber, wie der Glaube weiter vom Gottimperator entfernt ist als das Lex Imperia. Ich will, dass Sein Gesetz die einzige Säule des Glaubens für die Arbitratoren wird. Ich will sie nicht nur als Marschall führen, sondern auch als Prediger."

languages.text: « Hormis de servir sans jamais faillir ? À vrai dire, j'ai beaucoup réfléchi récemment... Je pense que le Credo est plus éloigné de l'Empereur-Dieu que la Lex Imperialis. Je veux que Sa loi devienne l'unique pilier de la foi des arbitrators. Je ne veux pas me contenter d'être leur maréchal, je veux également devenir leur prédicateur. »
languages.original_text: "Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His Law to become the sole pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."

traits.locale_text: « Hormis de servir sans jamais faillir ? À vrai dire, j'ai beaucoup réfléchi récemment... Je pense que le Credo est plus éloigné de l'Empereur-Dieu que la Lex Imperialis. Je veux que Sa loi devienne l'unique pilier de la foi des arbitrators. Je ne veux pas me contenter d'être leur maréchal, je veux également devenir leur prédicateur. »

« Hormis de servir sans jamais faillir ? À vrai dire, j'ai beaucoup réfléchi récemment... Je pense que le Credo est plus éloigné de l'Empereur-Dieu que la Lex Imperialis. Je veux que Sa loi devienne l'unique pilier de la foi des arbitrators. Je ne veux pas me contenter d'être leur maréchal, je veux également devenir leur prédicateur. »

languages.text: «¿Aparte de un servicio indefectible? Lo cierto es que últimamente le he dado muchas vueltas. El Credo está más lejos del Dios Emperador que la Lex Imperialis. Quiero que Su ley se convierta en el único pilar de fe para los Arbitrator. Deseo guiarlos no solo como mariscal, también como predicador».
languages.original_text: "Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His Law to become the sole pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."

traits.locale_text: «¿Aparte de un servicio indefectible? Lo cierto es que últimamente le he dado muchas vueltas. El Credo está más lejos del Dios Emperador que la Lex Imperialis. Quiero que Su ley se convierta en el único pilar de fe para los Arbitrator. Deseo guiarlos no solo como mariscal, también como predicador».

languages.text: “除了全心全意侍奉帝国律法之外的事情吗？老实说，我最近确实想了很多事情……对神皇的信仰，应当成为比帝国律法本身更加重要的支柱。我想让祂的圣律成为所有法务官唯一的信仰支柱。我希望我不仅仅能肩负起元帅的职责，更能以布道士的身份指引全体法务官前进。”
languages.original_text: "Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His Law to become the sole pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."

traits.locale_text: “除了全心全意侍奉帝国律法之外的事情吗？老实说，我最近确实想了很多事情……对神皇的信仰，应当成为比帝国律法本身更加重要的支柱。我想让祂的圣律成为所有法务官唯一的信仰支柱。我希望我不仅仅能肩负起元帅的职责，更能以布道士的身份指引全体法务官前进。”

languages.text: "Mutlak hizmetim dışında mı? Aslında son zamanlarda İtikat'ın, Tanrı İmparator'dan Lex İmperialis'e kıyasla nasıl daha uzakta durduğu hakkında düşünüp duruyordum. Yargıcıların tek inanç dayanağının O'nun Yasası olmasını istiyorum. Onlara sadece Miralay olarak değil, aynı zamanda vaiz olarak da rehberlik etmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His Law to become the sole pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."

traits.locale_text: "Mutlak hizmetim dışında mı? Aslında son zamanlarda İtikat'ın, Tanrı İmparator'dan Lex İmperialis'e kıyasla nasıl daha uzakta durduğu hakkında düşünüp duruyordum. Yargıcıların tek inanç dayanağının O'nun Yasası olmasını istiyorum. Onlara sadece Miralay olarak değil, aynı zamanda vaiz olarak da rehberlik etmek istiyorum."

"Mutlak hizmetim dışında mı? Aslında son zamanlarda İtikadın, Tanrı İmparator'dan Lex İmperialis'e kıyasla nasıl daha uzakta durduğu hakkında düşünüp duruyordum. Yargıcıların tek inanç dayanağının O'nun kanunları olmasını istiyorum. Onlara sadece bir Miralay olarak değil, aynı zamanda bir vaiz olarak da rehberlik etmek istiyorum."

languages.original_text: "Other than unerring service? Actually, I've been thinking a lot lately... about how the Creed stands farther from the God-Emperor than the Lex Imperialis. I want His Law to become the sole pillar of faith for the Arbitrators. I wish to guide them not only as a Marshal, but also as a preacher."
